original_title: Ted Nugent: Motor City Mayhem - 6,000th Concert
overview: Veteran rocker Ted Nugent marks his 6,000th concert by whipping a hometown Detroit crowd into a frenzy with this sizzling Fourth of July show, featuring unforgettable hits such as "Cat Scratch Fever" and "Stranglehold." The Motor City Madman also pays tribute to America's birthday with a rendition of "The Star-Spangled Banner," then lays into "Need You Bad," "Wango Tango," "Free for All" and more.
title: Ted Nugent: Motor City Mayhem - 6,000th Concert
